headline: BTC consolidates near recent range highs as liquidity remains selective
summary: Price is holding within a tight range while reaction speed suggests selective liquidity. The move looks more like positioning than a fresh trend leg.
keyPoints: Range behavior dominates; follow-through is limited
Short bursts of volatility fade quickly
Liquidity looks thin away from the mid-range
Funding appears neutral; no extreme crowding
whyItMatters: Selective liquidity increases whipsaw risk; waiting for cleaner confirmation often improves decision quality.

headline: US data watch: market focus shifts to macro prints and risk repricing
summary: Attention is rotating toward upcoming macro releases, with participants sensitive to surprises. Positioning may become more defensive into the event window.
keyPoints: Volatility can expand around data windows
Risk assets may reprice quickly on surprises
Correlation regimes often shift near macro events
whyItMatters: Macro windows can override local technicals; context-first review reduces impulsive trades.
